Package danfulea.network

This package is used for basic networking tasks.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientMessenger
    The messenger client associated with messenger server.
    ClientWorker
    The thread for messenger client which is connected to messenger server.
    SendMail
    Sometimes it is useful to send mail directly from an application.
    ServerMessenger
    A simple messenger server, a skype-like messenger It is very simple and very efficient to use in an internal network environment, such as internal network of a company.
    SimpleWebBrowserDemo
    This class is a demo class for building a very simple web browser.

Package danfulea.network Description

This package is used for basic networking tasks.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dan Fulea, 11 AUG. 2016
